channel.title: Retribution Pk Development Team - Apply now
channel.description:
Hey there Moparscape.
I am Hah Bah Gee, have currently released 2 of my own servers, and am starting on a third one.
This one I plan on making a main pking server, better than all the rest and giving life to the dead mage/range pking...
This server will have full range, full specials (even bows), Full magic, and regular melee...
We Will not bring in TONS of items into the game because then it gives less focus on pking, and more focus on the economy...
Most items will be between 1 - 5M with the exception of maybe some of the higher melee items...
We will have a home area, a shops area, a 1v1 pk area, and a team pk area, and thats it...
All items you normally get from a npc will be sold I.E firecape, 3rdage, bandos...
It will not be a long project but mainly will get the development team familiar with eachother...
I would prefer we have a remote server set up with some1 that can host the server as much as possible...
Please post to apply or pm me on my msn: hahbahgee@fagex.net
We will discuss further details on msn...
